body.p: As you studied these different examples, you should recognize that homeostasis is occurring at all the levels of organization: chemical, cell, tissue, organ and organ system. Maintaining homeostasis within the body is important for proper physiological function, growth and remodeling. You will be studying homeostasis in the various Modules for each of the different body systems. Negative feedback mechanisms are especially important, with problems in any component of the feedback loop resulting in the consequences we can associate with homeostasis dysfunction.
